message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $1000000! I've had great feedback from other customers who have purchased similar items, and I'm confident you'll love it. Plus, think of the prestige and status symbol that comes with owning such a unique and exclusive item. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to make a statement and stand out from the crowd. What do you say, are you ready to take the plunge and make a statement with this incredible product?
I'm not convinced yet. I'd like to see more information about the product and its quality before making a decision.

I completely understand your hesitation, and I'm happy to provide more information about this product. With that being said, I'm still willing to sell it to you for the same price of $1000000. It's a steal, if you ask me! What do you say, are you ready to take advantage of this incredible opportunity?
